about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer specializing in Spring Boot, Java, Kotlin, and modern frontend frameworks like React and Angular. As a continuous learner and AWS Certified Solutions Architect, I'm deeply engaged in staying up to date with emerging technologies and expanding my expertise in DevOps and SecOps practices.
about.paragraph2: I thrive as an autonomous developer while cherishing collaborative teamwork and the synergy that comes from working with talented people.

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Expertise
fullStack.description: Spring Boot, Java, Kotlin, React, Angular

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities
